entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
